properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 6:32PM EST until January 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25
kt. Waves 2 to 4 ft. For the Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to
30 kt with possible gusts 35 to 40 kt. Waves 4 to 5 ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA,
Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA and
Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM EST
Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday evening through
late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
